name: Inclusion Unpacked
description: Inclusion Unpacked is on a mission to make diversity and inclusion simple and easy for founders and leaders. Companies pay a monthly subscription fee and gain access to DEI experts, tools and resources on demand.
one_liner: Inclusion Unpacked is on a mission to make diversity and inclusion simple and easy for founders and leaders. Companies pay a monthly subscription fee and gain access to DEI experts, tools and resources on demand.
location: New York City, New York, United States
